revision.text:
{{delete|Not a ZDoom mod, so outside of this wiki's scope.}} {{wad |author=Patrick Culy AKA "Frater D~D" |type=m |port=GZDoom |iwad=Hexen |status=Released |link= |category = "also recommended" |ru=1 }}
KaoZ is a 9 level addon episode designed for Heretic. Specifically designed for jHeretic with the HiResTex Pack but also it will run with the original Heretic and zDoom but it is a little dark since it was designed with Doomsdays Area lighting.
